22 LookForObject::LookForObject(const std::string &name) : BT::ConditionNode(name, {})
23 {
24  ros::param::get("target_color", target_color);
25  ros::param::get("img_path", img_path);
26  ros::param::get("img_temp", img_temp);
27  params.minArea = BLOB_MIN_PX;
28  params.maxArea = BLOB_MAX_PX;
29  params.filterByArea = true;
30  params.filterByColor = false;
31  params.filterByInertia = false;
32  params.filterByConvexity = false;
33  params.thresholdStep = 50;
34  ROS_INFO("[%s] Initialized.", this->name().c_str());
35 }

44  node_handle_ = node_handle;

62 void LookForObject::init(TomatoQueue &tomato_queue)

66 
72 BT::NodeStatus LookForObject::tick()
73 {
74  LOG_VISION_START(this->name());
75  ROS_INFO("[%s] Looking for %s object.", this->name().c_str(), target_color.c_str());
76  FetchNewPerception(); // Receive an image
77  // Convert to HSV and threshold
78  cv::Mat img, img_hsv, img_threshold, img_keypoints;
79  img = cv_bridge::toCvShare(latest_image_, "bgr8")->image;
80  cv::cvtColor(img, img_hsv, cv::COLOR_BGR2HSV);
81  image_processing::PerceptFilterThreshold(target_color, img_hsv, img_threshold);
82  // Do blob detection
83  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints = image_processing::PerceptBlobDetection(img, img_threshold, img_keypoints, params);
84 // Display the image
85 #ifdef VISION_SHOW_IMG
86  if (!img_keypoints.empty())
87  {
88  cv::imwrite(img_temp + "raw.jpg", img);
89  cv::imwrite(img_temp + "keypoints.jpg", img_keypoints);
90  cv::imwrite(img_temp + "threshold.jpg", img_threshold);
91  }
92 #endif
93 
94 // Save Image
95 #ifdef VISION_SAVE_IMG
96  static int img_cntr = 1;
97  std::string filename = img_path + "img" + std::to_string(img_cntr) + ".jpg";
98  img_cntr++;
99  cv::imwrite(filename, img_keypoints);
100 #endif
101  if (keypoints.size() > 0)
102  {
103  ROS_INFO("---------------I found some tomatoes!---------------");
104  uint8_t tomato_counter = 1;
105 
106  for (auto tomato : keypoints)
107  {
108  ROS_INFO("TOMATO %d @ (%.2f, %.2f) with radius %.2f px.", tomato_counter, tomato.pt.x, tomato.pt.y, tomato.size);
109  pcl::PointXYZ center_of_ROI = image_processing::GetROICenter(tomato, latest_cloud2_);
110  TomatoCoordinates t = pointcloud_processing::FitSphereInCloud(latest_cloud2_, center_of_ROI, false);
111  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tomato_map = EstimateTomatoLocation(&t, latest_cloud2_);
112  LOG_POSE_SCAN(tomato_map,t.r);
113  tomato_queue_->AddTomato(t);
114  }
115  tomato_queue_->PrintQueue();
116  LOG_VISION_STOP(this->name());
117  return BT::NodeStatus::SUCCESS;
118  }
119  else
120  {
121  ROS_WARN("[%s] No object detected!", this->name().c_str());
122  LOG_VISION_STOP(this->name());
123  return BT::NodeStatus::FAILURE;
124  }
125 }
126 
127 #pragma endregion
128 
129 #pragma region private
130 
135 void LookForObject::FetchNewPerception()
136 {
137  image_transport::ImageTransport it(node_handle_);
138  image_transport::Subscriber sub = it.subscribe("/summit_xl/arm_camera/rgb/image_raw", 1, &LookForObject::ImageCallback, this);
139 
140  ros::Subscriber sub_cloud_2 = node_handle_.subscribe("/summit_xl/arm_camera/depth_registered/points", 1, &LookForObject::CloudCallback2, this);
141  received_image_ = false;
142  received_cloud2_ = false;
143  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
144  while ((!received_image_) || (!received_cloud2_))
145  {
146  ros::spinOnce();
147  }
148  sub.shutdown();
149  sub_cloud_2.shutdown();
150 }
151 
159 geometry_msgs::PoseStamped EstimateTomatoLocation(TomatoCoordinates *tomato_coordinates, sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 latest_cloud2_)
160 {
161  tf::TransformListener listener;
162  listener.waitForTransform(MAP_FRAME, CAMERA_FRAME, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3.0));
163  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tomato_cameraframe;
164  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tomato_mapframe;
165  tomato_cameraframe.pose.position.x = tomato_coordinates->x;
166  tomato_cameraframe.pose.position.y = tomato_coordinates->y;
167  tomato_cameraframe.pose.position.z = tomato_coordinates->z;
168  tomato_cameraframe.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(0, 0, 1.5708);
169  tomato_cameraframe.header.frame_id = latest_cloud2_.header.frame_id;
170  tomato_cameraframe.header.stamp = ros::Time();
171  listener.transformPose(MAP_FRAME, tomato_cameraframe, tomato_mapframe);
172  tomato_mapframe.header.frame_id = MAP_FRAME;
173  tomato_mapframe.header.stamp = ros::Time();
174  tomato_coordinates->x = tomato_mapframe.pose.position.x;
175  tomato_coordinates->y = tomato_mapframe.pose.position.y;
176  tomato_coordinates->z = tomato_mapframe.pose.position.z;
177  return tomato_mapframe;
178 }

181 {
182  latest_image_ = msg;
183  received_image_ = true;

206 ValidateTomato::ValidateTomato(const std::string &name, const BT::NodeConfiguration &config) : BT::ConditionNode(name, config)
207 {
208  ros::param::get("target_color", target_color);
209  ros::param::get("img_path", img_path);
210  ros::param::get("img_temp", img_temp);
211  params.minArea = BLOB_MIN_PX;
212  params.maxArea = BLOB_MAX_PX;
213  params.filterByArea = true;
214  params.filterByColor = false;
215  params.filterByInertia = false;
216  params.filterByConvexity = false;
217  params.thresholdStep = 50;
218  ROS_INFO("[%s] Initialized.", this->name().c_str());
219 }

236 BT::NodeStatus ValidateTomato::tick()
237 {
238  LOG_VISION_START(this->name());
239  ROS_INFO("[%s] Looking for %s object.", this->name().c_str(), target_color.c_str());
240  FetchNewPerception(); // Receive an image
241  // Convert to HSV and threshold
242  cv::Mat img, img_hsv, img_threshold, img_keypoints;
243  img = cv_bridge::toCvShare(latest_image_, "bgr8")->image;
244  cv::cvtColor(img, img_hsv, cv::COLOR_BGR2HSV);
245  image_processing::PerceptFilterThreshold(target_color, img_hsv, img_threshold);
246  // Do blob detection
247  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints = image_processing::PerceptBlobDetection(img, img_threshold, img_keypoints, params);
248  // Display the image
249 #ifdef VISION_SHOW_IMG
250 
251  cv::imwrite(img_temp + "keypoints.jpg", img_keypoints);
252  cv::imwrite(img_temp + "threshold.jpg", img_threshold);
253 #endif
254  float min_distnace_img_center = FLT_MAX;
255  float center_x = img_keypoints.size().width / 2.0f;
256  float center_y = img_keypoints.size().height / 2.0f;
257  cv::KeyPoint center;
258  if (keypoints.size() > 0)
259  {
260  for (auto kp : keypoints)
261  {
262  float center_dist = pow(kp.pt.x - center_x, 2) + pow(kp.pt.y - center_y, 2);
263  if (center_dist < min_distnace_img_center)
264  {
265  min_distnace_img_center = center_dist;
266  center = kp;
267  }
268  }
269  ROS_INFO("%.2f %.2f", center.pt.x, center.pt.y);
270  pcl::PointXYZ center_of_ROI = image_processing::GetROICenter(center, latest_cloud2_);
271  TomatoCoordinates t = pointcloud_processing::FitSphereInCloud(latest_cloud2_, center_of_ROI, true);
272  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped tomato_map = EstimateTomatoLocation(&t, latest_cloud2_);
273  LOG_POSE_VAL(tomato_map, t.r);
274  BT::Optional<float> tomato_map_x = getInput<float>("target_x");
275  BT::Optional<float> tomato_map_y = getInput<float>("target_y");
276  BT::Optional<float> tomato_map_z = getInput<float>("target_z");
277  double delta = sqrt(pow(tomato_map.pose.position.x - tomato_map_x.value(), 2) +
278  pow(tomato_map.pose.position.y - tomato_map_y.value(), 2) +
279  pow(tomato_map.pose.position.z - tomato_map_z.value(), 2));
280  if (delta < 0.07)
281  {
282  float airgap = ba_helper::CalculateGripperParameterFromDesiredAirgap(2 * t.r);
283  ROS_INFO("Desired airgap between gripper fingers: %.3f m", 2*t.r);
284  setOutput("gripper_airgap", (float)airgap);
285  setOutput("target_x", (float)tomato_map.pose.position.x);
286  setOutput("target_y", (float)tomato_map.pose.position.y);
287  setOutput("target_z", (float)tomato_map.pose.position.z);
288  LOG_VISION_STOP(this->name());
289  return BT::NodeStatus::SUCCESS;
290  }
291  else
292  {
293  ROS_ERROR("Delta: %.4f", delta);
294  setOutput("gripper_airgap", 0.0f);
295  LOG_VISION_STOP(this->name());
296  return BT::NodeStatus::FAILURE;
297  }
298  }
299  else
300  {
301  LOG_VISION_STOP(this->name());
302  return BT::NodeStatus::FAILURE;
303  }
304 }
305 
311 BT::PortsList ValidateTomato::providedPorts()
312 {
313  return {BT::InputPort<float>("target_x"),
314  BT::InputPort<float>("target_y"),
315  BT::InputPort<float>("target_z"),
316  BT::OutputPort<float>("target_x"),
317  BT::OutputPort<float>("target_y"),
318  BT::OutputPort<float>("target_z"),
319  BT::OutputPort<float>("gripper_airgap")};
320 }

339  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
340  while ((!received_image_) || (!received_cloud2_))
341  {
342  ros::spinOnce();

344  sub.shutdown();
